message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This product holds immense significance and potential for growth, which we believe aligns perfectly with your interests and needs. We are offering it to you at a special price of $12,500, considering its worth to you is $10,000. We believe this price offers an excellent opportunity for you to maximize your investment while securing a high-quality asset. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success and prosperity. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
